name: Switchblade: Epic Pack
storyline: Fight your way up the season ranks to become a online superstar in a spectacular future-sport championship. Seamlessly switch between heavily armed high tech vehicles at any time to create endless tactical choices in a frantic 5v5 battle to take down the opposition’s towers and claim victory.
summary:
The Switchblade Epic Pack includes the full game with additional 10 vehicles to own and use forever.

Fog Hog, Tiny Giant, Thunder Pulse, Berserker, Goofer, Electron, Gravitron
Kamikaze, Safeguard, Healing Hippo
